item.description: Come for an afternoon to The New England Aquarium located on the blue line T-stop. We will meet at 2PM outside the Aquarium and the get our tickets. Tickets are $19.95. I am working on getting us a discount. At 5PM we will head out to The Reef, which is their outdoor restaurant. They serve pizzas, grilled sandwiches, wraps, and also alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages. Jodi Griffith is performing selections from her newly released CD, I Believe. Website is www.jodigriffith.com.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be holding a meetup sign at the entrance to the Aquarium
item.name: The Aquarium and music and supper at The Reef
